long_description: High-energy food in a gel form-from the makers of the popular PowerBar(R)! Provides electrolytes that you need for high performance. C2MAX carbohydrate blend uses a mix of glucose and fructose that results in greater absorption, producing more energy than glucose alone. Complex carbohydrates derived from maltodextrin, brown rice and oat bran provide prolonged energy. Simple carbohydrates (glucose and fructose) are derived from pears, grapes and corn for quick energy. Convenient, easy-to-use, long-neck squeeze package has softened edges making it easier to handle and carry. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: High-energy food in a gel form-from the makers of the popular PowerBar(R)!
